tools.name: Swedish API License Wizard
tools.summary: This wizard makes easy to walk through all the choices needed to customize the License according to the legal and commercial considerations required for a particular API. These choices are also available as text and it is recommended that all decisions made about the License customization are made after the legal and commercial options are studied.
